mapper.select: SELECT LINE_ID, NAME, INLINE_FLG, IN_ADVANCE, UPDATED_BY, UPDATED_TIME FROM V_LINE WHERE DELETE_FLG = 0 AND LINE_ID = #{line_id};
SELECT LINE_ID, NAME, INLINE_FLG, IN_ADVANCE, UPDATED_BY, UPDATED_TIME FROM V_LINE WHERE DELETE_FLG = 0 ORDER BY LINE_ID ASC;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LINE (NAME, UPDATED_BY, INLINE_FLG, IN_ADVANCE, UPDATED_TIME) VALUES (#{name}, #{updated_by}, #{inline_flg}, #{in_advance}, current_timestamp);
mapper.update: UPDATE LINE SET NAME = #{name}, UPDATED_BY = #{updated_by}, INLINE_FLG = #{inline_flg}, IN_ADVANCE = #{in_advance}, UPDATED_TIME = current_timestamp WHERE LINE_ID = #{line_id};
UPDATE LINE SET DELETE_FLG = 1, UPDATED_BY = #{updated_by}, UPDATED_TIME = current_timestamp WHERE LINE_ID = #{line_id};
